means: 撒尿，鬼混，游荡( piddle的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: They are arguing over piddling amounts of money.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们在为一点小钱争吵。

sentence.Network_en: Generally, Scarlett would not have cared whether she received at Melly's piddling parties or not.
sentence.Network_cn: 在通常情况下, 思嘉并不在意是否在媚兰举办的家宴上参加接待客人.

sentence.Network_en: It's annoying to have to get authorization for spending such piddling amounts of money.
sentence.Network_cn: 花这麽一点钱也要去请示,真烦人.

PID 比例-积分-微分piddling 微小的pie slice filter 切饼滤波器
...paltry————微不足道的，下贱的，不足取的piddling——一批的零，无用的，琐屑的。By
pictorial 绘画的，图片表示的piddling 琐碎的，微不足道的pied 杂色的

list.abs: I don't want to hear all the piddling little details !我不想听那些琐碎的事！
dog pick bone 狗啃骨dog piddle 狗尿dog salmon 大马哈鱼
We piddled away the whole afternoon ., 整个一下午我们都无所事事.
you can't think about piddling problems , you have to let them go .你不能考虑小问题，你得把它们放开。

entry.tran: 微不足道的；无关紧要的

means.word_mean: 1. (informal terms) small and of little importance;

sentences.sentence: "our worries are lilliputian compared with those of countries that are at war"
"giving a police officer a free meal may be against the law, but it seems to be a picayune infraction"

auth_sentence.content: How piddling must non-anglers see these yet those who fish know they are weights that are never likely to be achieved.

auth_sentence.content: He's the one who volunteered first as car-share warden for our road; one piddling little Peugeot for the entire road.
